meanings.definition: Shared features or characteristics among a group of things or people.
meanings.sent1: The communalities between the two cultures were evident in their traditional dances.
meanings.sent2: The communalities in beliefs brought the community together.
meanings.sent3: The communalities in taste made them the perfect cooking partners.
meanings.sent4: The communalities in their personalities created a strong bond between them.
meanings.sent5: The communalities in their goals united them towards a common purpose.

meanings.definition: The quality of being communal or communal in nature.
meanings.sent1: The communalities of the neighborhood were evident during the annual block party.
meanings.sent2: The communalities of the village were reflected in their shared traditions.
meanings.sent3: The communalities of the siblings made their family gatherings lively and fun.
meanings.sent4: The communalities of the team members led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent5: The communalities of the students fostered a sense of belonging in the school community.
